creator: vhennebert@gmail.com
text: When accessibility is enabled, an foi:ptr property is added to all relevant FOs in order to ensure their uniqueness. The standard id property could be used instead, but extra care is necessary in case some FOs have an ID and some not: IDs generated for those latter must not have already been defined on the former. A two-pass processing must be done, one to collect existing IDs, one to generated missing IDs. More discussion in bug #46705.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: resetting P2 open bugs to P3 pending further review
